blocks.title: Halloween at Justia
blocks.description: Halloween came and went, and as is our annual tradition, we tapped into our creative side and came up with some really great costumes. Each year, we see even more creativity than the previous one! Some were scary, others were silly, and everyone had a fun time.

blocks.title: Justia at the World Series!
blocks.description: We’re big sports fans here at Justia, and baseball is no exception. Recently, Samuel attended Game 1 of the Dodgers vs. Astros World Series showdown at Dodger Stadium in Chavez Ravine - Los Angeles. Although it was a hot one, clocking in at 103F on the field at the game’s start, Samuel said he and his friend had a blast (and kept the sun at bay in their Justia hats!).
